issue.title: jottacloud: set metadata on server side copy and move - fixes #7900

repository.name: rclone
repository.description: "rsync for cloud storage" - Google Drive, S3, Dropbox, Backblaze B2, One Drive, Swift, Hubic, Wasabi, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob, Azure Files, Yandex Files

issue.body:
#### What is the purpose of this change?

Jottacloud has writable metadata `mtime` and `btime`. On server-side copy and move the source metadata are preserved, but if custom values are set using the --metadata-set key=value these are not considered.

Example:
```
rclone lsjson jfs:Temp/r1 --metadata
[{"Path":"rclone.exe","Name":"rclone.exe","Size":122671560,"MimeType":"application/octet-stream","ModTime":"2024-05-01T08:19:09Z","IsDir":false,"Metadata":{"btime":"2024-05-01T08:19:09Z","content-type":"application/octet-stream","mtime":"2024-05-01T08:19:09Z","utime":"2024-05-01T08:34:40Z"}}]
rclone copy jfs:Temp/r1 jfs:Temp/r2 --metadata --metadata-set mtime=2003-02-03T04:05:06.499999999Z
rclone lsjson jfs:Temp/r2 --metadata
[{"Path":"rclone.exe","Name":"rclone.exe","Size":122671560,"MimeType":"application/octet-stream","ModTime":"2024-05-01T08:19:09Z","IsDir":false,"Metadata":{"btime":"2024-05-01T08:19:09Z","content-type":"application/octet-stream","mtime":"2024-05-01T08:19:09Z","utime":"2024-06-13T06:02:39Z"}}]
```

#### Was the change discussed in an issue or in the forum before?

https://github.com/rclone/rclone/issues/7900

#### Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [contribution guidelines](https://github.com/rclone/rclone/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#submitting-a-new-feature-or-bug-fix).
- [ ] I have added tests for all changes in this PR if appropriate.
- [ ] I have added documentation for the changes if appropriate.
- [ ] All commit messages are in [house style](https://github.com/rclone/rclone/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#commit-messages).
- [ ] I'm done, this Pull Request is ready for review :-)

body:
@albertony 

In the integration tests this morning it looks like this test failed

```
=== RUN   TestIntegration/FsMkdir/FsPutFiles/FsMove/Metadata
    fstest.go:122: 
        	Error Trace:	/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:122
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:127
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:146
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:190
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:303
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:333
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:339
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstests/fstests.go:1418
        	Error:      	Should be true
        	Test:       	TestIntegration/FsMkdir/FsPutFiles/FsMove/Metadata
        	Messages:   	test metadata moved.txt: Modification time difference too big |9456h0m0.499999999s| > 1s (want 2004-03-03 04:05:06.499999999 +0000 UTC vs got 2003-02-03 04:05:06 +0000 UTC) (precision 1s)
    fstest.go:122: 
        	Error Trace:	/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:122
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:606
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstests/fstests.go:1421
        	Error:      	Should be true
        	Test:       	TestIntegration/FsMkdir/FsPutFiles/FsMove/Metadata
        	Messages:   	test metadata moved.txt: Modification time difference too big |9456h0m0.499999999s| > 1s (want 2004-03-03 04:05:06.499999999 +0000 UTC vs got 2003-02-03 04:05:06 +0000 UTC) (precision 1s)
    fstest.go:122: 
        	Error Trace:	/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:122
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:606
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstests/fstests.go:1423
        	Error:      	Should be true
        	Test:       	TestIntegration/FsMkdir/FsPutFiles/FsMove/Metadata
        	Messages:   	test metadata moved.txt: Modification time difference too big |9456h0m0.499999999s| > 1s (want 2004-03-03 04:05:06.499999999 +0000 UTC vs got 2003-02-03 04:05:06 +0000 UTC) (precision 1s)
```

Which is weird since the code looked OK and I assume you tested it.

Any ideas?
I started looking into it 2,5 minutes ago.. :)

Ah, its because it takes another path: `DirMove`.

And that's more challenging to fix, isn't it? I mean, should `--metadata-set` apply to all files, or only the top level dir? And why does both onedrive and local backends also have DirMove implementations, but neither of them seemed to need additional handling for metadata?

When implementing the tests I decided to bail on DirMove as it was too difficult!

So I'm not sure why this is failing as it wasn't my intention that DirMove would need to be changed.

I'm going to re-open this as the Move tests are still failing in the same way :-(

From today's integration test run

```
"go test -v -timeout 1h0m0s -remote TestJottacloud: -verbose -test.run '^TestIntegration$/^FsMkdir$/^FsPutFiles$/^FsMove$/^Metadata$'" - Starting (try 5/5)

    fstests.go:442: Using remote "TestJottacloud:"
2024/09/07 01:05:39 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote "TestJottacloud:rclone-test-tacekit9kuqo"
2024/09/07 01:05:39 DEBUG : Using config file from "/home/rclone/.rclone.conf"

=== RUN   TestIntegration/FsMkdir/FsPutFiles
=== RUN   TestIntegration/FsMkdir/FsPutFiles/FsMove
=== RUN   TestIntegration/FsMkdir/FsPutFiles/FsMove/Metadata
    fstest.go:121: 
        	Error Trace:	/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:121
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:126
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:145

        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstests/fstests.go:1434
        	Error:      	Should be true
        	Test:       	TestIntegration/FsMkdir/FsPutFiles/FsMove/Metadata
        	Messages:   	test metadata moved.txt: Modification time difference too big |9456h0m0.499999999s| > 1s (want 2004-03-03 04:05:06.499999999 +0000 UTC vs got 2003-02-03 04:05:06 +0000 UTC) (precision 1s)
    fstest.go:121: 
        	Error Trace:	/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:121
        	            				/home/rclone/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/fstest/fstest.go:605

        	Test:       	TestIntegration/FsMkdir/FsPutFiles/FsMove/Metadata
        	Messages:   	test metadata moved.txt: Modification time difference too big |9456h0m0.499999999s| > 1s (want 2004-03-03 04:05:06.499999999 +0000 UTC vs got 2003-02-03 04:05:06 +0000 UTC) (precision 1s)
    fstest.go:121:
```

issue.title: Fix setting of metadata on server side move in Jottacloud
